overview: Heartbreaker can make any woman do whatever she wants, but her superpower has become a burden. She's hung it up. She don't break hearts no more. But when super-villain Obscura tries to kidnap Heartbreaker's old partner Ice Queen - but mistakenly captures her girlfriend instead - Ice Queen convinces Heartbreaker to take on one last job. Together with x-ray visionary Spex, they set out to storm Obscura's fortress, guarded by 40 pairs of bionic stepsisters. So begins a journey reprete with danger.
title: Heartbreaker vs Obscura: Lesbian Superheroes
